item.title: 普京与莫迪和习近平会晤，商讨能源需求问题
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）本周末将有一个难得的机会与他最重要的两个能源伙伴会面，而此时他正需要从这两个伙伴那里得到一些东西。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin has a rare opportunity to meet with his two most important energy partners this weekend, at a time when he needs something from both.】

item.title: 超微申报引发对财务控制的担忧
item.description: 超微计算机公司警告说，如果不解决财务披露控制方面的薄弱环节，就会损害该公司 "及时、准确地 "报告业绩的能力。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. cautioned that weaknesses in its controls related to financial disclosures could, if not fixed, hurt the company’s ability to report results “in a timely and accurate manner.”】

item.title: 看看你让我赌了什么？泰勒-斯威夫特与爆炸性的预测行业
item.description:
在今天的 Big Take 播客中：泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）和特拉维斯-凯尔斯（Travis Kelce）的交往对 Polymarket 等快速发展的预测网站有何启示？【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: What Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s engagement tells us about rapidly growing prediction sites like Polymarket.

】

item.title: 纽森防止泵价飙升的计划面临 5 年延期
item.description: 据熟悉相关计划的人士透露，加州能源委员会将推迟实施州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）寻求的炼油厂利润上限。【原文：The California Energy Commission is set to delay the implementation of a refiner profit cap sought by Governor Gavin Newsom, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: YouTube 的第三幕：人工智能与 TikTok
item.description:
这家曾经潦倒的美国初创企业如今已成为一家拥有 20 年历史的巨头。在它的第三个十年里，它面临着人工智能的前景和危险，以及中国竞争对手的崛起。【原文：

The once-scrappy US startup is now a 20-year-old giant. In its third decade, it faces the promise and peril of artificial intelligence—and the rise of a Chinese rival.

】

item.title: 随着扭亏为盈的势头增强，Petco 在上调利润预期后跳涨
item.description: Petco Health & Wellness Co Inc.在上调今年的盈利目标后大涨 31%，因为该公司的扭亏为盈开始出现进展迹象。【原文：Petco Health & Wellness Co Inc. surged as much as 31% after raising its earnings targets for the year as the company’s turnaround starts showing signs of progress.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 McAfee 用现金赎回优先股
item.description: 杀毒软件先驱 McAfee 公司正在清除其资产负债表中成本最高的证券：优先股。【原文：McAfee, a pioneer in antivirus software, is ridding its balance sheet of its most costly securities: preferred shares.】

item.title: 戴尔上调年度预测，因人工智能服务器需求强劲
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc. ）上调了年度业绩展望，公布的季度销售额和利润均超出分析师预期，这主要得益于对人工智能服务器持续强劲的需求，这些服务器为不断扩大的数据中心提供动力。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. boosted its annual outlook and posted quarterly sales and profit that topped analysts’ estimates, building on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers that power an expanding fleet of data centers.】

item.title: 研究人员发现，人工智能聊天机器人和人类一样容易受骗
item.description: 研究人员发现，人工智能聊天机器人可以像人一样被操控。但首先...【原文：AI chatbots can be manipulated much in the same way that people can, according to researchers. But first…】

item.title: 诺和诺德业绩下滑，丹麦下调经济增长预期
item.description: 据彭博新闻社看到的政府文件显示，由于制药巨头诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）前景疲软，丹麦正在将其 2025 年的经济增长预测下调一半以上。【原文：Denmark is cutting its forecast for 2025 economic growth by more than half amid weaker prospects for pharmaceutical giant Novo Nordisk A/S, according to government documents seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会称离岸加密货币公司有机会拉拢美国用户
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）采取了一项措施，使一些海外加密货币交易所更容易合法地向美国交易者提供衍生品，此举可能为 Binance Holdings Ltd. 等公司重新打开一条重返美国的道路。【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission has taken a step that could make it easier for some overseas crypto exchanges to legally offer derivatives to American traders, a move that could reopen a path back into the US for firms like Binance Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 波兰称 F-16 战斗机在航展前坠毁，飞行员丧生
item.description: 据波兰特勤部门协调员托马斯-西莫尼亚克（Tomasz Siemoniak）称，一架 F-16 战斗机的飞行员在国际航展前的彩排中坠机身亡。【原文：The pilot of an F-16 fighter jet was killed in Poland when his warplane crashed during rehearsal before the international air show, according to the country’s coordinator of special services Tomasz Siemoniak.】

item.title: 丽莎-库克暗示 "文书错误 "是房贷纠纷的幕后推手
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的律师表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统希望她被解雇的抵押贷款纠纷背后可能是一个无意的 "文书错误"。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook’s lawyers suggested that an unintentional “clerical error” may have been behind the mortgage dispute over which President Donald Trump wants her fired.】

item.title: 美国能源部削减数据后，关键能源数据被推迟或暂停发布
item.description: 美国政府的能源统计机构推迟了一份重要的铀报告，并暂停了一项年度太阳能分析，这是特朗普政府裁员对行业数据造成的首批影响。【原文：The US government’s energy statistics agency has delayed a key uranium report and suspended an annual solar analysis, marking some of the first impacts on industry data as Trump administration staff cuts take hold.】

item.title: 生物燃料不确定性持续存在，豆油连续第四天下跌
item.description: 由于生物燃料政策的不确定性和周末假期的临近，豆油价格下跌，连跌走势延续至第四天。【原文：Soybean oil fell, extending a losing streak to a fourth day, as biofuels policy uncertainty and the approaching holiday weekend helped weigh on prices.】

item.title: 让我们谈谈关税引发的对美禁运
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 住房市场和经济放缓导致 EQB 下降幅度为 2020 年以来最大
item.description: 由于加拿大经济和房地产市场放缓抑制了这家挑战者银行的盈利，EQB Inc.【原文：EQB Inc. shares fell by the most intraday since 2020 on Thursday as a slowing Canadian economy and housing market dampened the challenger bank’s earnings.】

item.title: 法国即将与欧盟达成协议，结束长期水电僵局
item.description: 法国政府已与欧盟委员会达成一项原则性协议，以解决长期以来阻碍国有电力公司法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）扩大水力发电能力的争端。【原文：The French government has reached an agreement in principle with the European Commission to resolve a long-standing dispute that had been preventing state-owned utility Electricite de France SA from expanding its hydropower capacity.】

item.title: 新日铁向 1 亿吨产能目标迈进
item.description: 新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp. ）表示，在收购美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. said it’s moving closer to its long-term goal of reaching 100 million tons of annual crude steel production capacity after its acquisition of United States Steel Corp.】

item.title: Z 世代对 TikTok 和退货的热爱使英国零售业销售额存疑
item.description: 专家警告说，Z 世代的购物习惯和季节性模式的变化正在给英国消费者的状况带来困惑，此前，零售销售陷入了困扰英国官方数据的信心危机。【原文：The shopping habits of Generation Z and shifting seasonal patterns are sowing confusion over the state of the British consumer, experts warned after retail sales became embroiled in the crisis of confidence engulfing the country’s official data.】

item.title: 微软软件工程师在硅谷校园逝世，享年 35 岁
item.description: 微软公司一名 35 岁的软件工程师在公司硅谷园区去世。【原文：A 35-year-old Microsoft Corp. software engineer has died at the company’s Silicon Valley campus.】

item.title: 扎克伯格在威胁征收关税前曾就数字税问题游说特朗普
item.description: 就在 Meta Platforms Inc.首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）在白宫的一次会议上提出了对征收数字税的担忧。【原文：President Donald Trump threatened to inflict “substantial” tariffs on countries that impose digital taxes just days after Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg raised concerns about the levies during a White House meeting.】

item.title: 中国价格战让阿里巴巴在财报发布前备受关注
item.description: 中国食品外卖行业激烈的价格战对中国电子商务巨头造成的损害超出预期，迫使分析师和投资者纷纷下调目标股价。【原文：An intense price war in China’s food delivery sector is dealing more damage than expected to the country’s e-commerce giants, forcing analysts and investors to slash their share price targets.】

item.title: 康卡斯特的孔雀服务加入亚马逊的 Prime 视频超市
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）的 Peacock 流媒体服务现在可以在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的 Prime Video 频道上观看，加入了在线电视超市日益增多的产品行列。【原文：Comcast Corp.’s Peacock streaming service will now be available on Amazon.com Inc.’s Prime Video Channels, joining a growing list of offerings on the online TV supermarket.】

item.title: 南非组建二十国集团不平等问题小组，由斯蒂格利茨担任主席
item.description: 作为 20 国集团主席国，南非成立了一个小组来解决极端财富不平等问题，这一举措可能会激怒美国。【原文：South Africa has set up a panel to tackle extreme wealth inequality as part of its Group of 20 chairmanship, a step that may irk the US.】

item.title: 埃及恢复降息，通胀降温，英镑走强
item.description: 埃及自 5 月以来首次降低利率，以刺激对经济复苏至关重要的投资，同时缓解中东地区最高的偿债成本。【原文：Egypt cut interest rates for the first time since May, seeking to spur investment key to an economic revival while easing some of the Middle East’s highest debt-servicing costs.】

item.title: 全美银行称黑客获取了 440 万客户的数据
item.description: 根据主要信用报告机构披露的监管信息，黑客在 7 月份访问了 400 多万名环联客户的个人信息。【原文：Hackers accessed the personal information of more than four million TransUnion customers in July, according to a regulatory disclosure from the major credit reporting agency.】

item.title: 英伟达携手谷歌资助英联邦聚变发电厂
item.description: Commonwealth Fusion Systems 公司从包括人工智能巨头 Nvidia 公司在内的投资者那里筹集了 8.63 亿美元，以帮助完成一个示范系统，并继续开发其首个商业工厂，该工厂将利用恒星的能量发电。【原文：Commonwealth Fusion Systems raised $863 million from investors including AI giant Nvidia Corp. to help complete a demonstration system and continue development of its first commercial plant that will generate electricity by harnessing the energy of the stars.】

item.title: 俄罗斯经济增长速度将低于不温不火的预期
item.description: 即使是央行对今年经济增长最谨慎的估计，俄罗斯也难以达到，这使人们对俄罗斯央行行长埃尔维拉-纳比乌琳娜继续保证经济不会在高利率下过度降温产生怀疑。【原文：Russia is struggling to meet even the most cautious central bank estimate for growth this year, casting doubt on continued assurances from Governor Elvira Nabiullina that the economy isn’t cooling excessively under high interest rates.】

item.title: Altice 称正考虑竞购以色列炙手可热的电信部门
item.description: 随着亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）出售其帝国的部分资产，Altice International 表示其以色列业务 Hot Telecommunication Systems Ltd. 已收到报价。【原文：Altice International said it’s gotten an offer for its Israeli business, Hot Telecommunication Systems Ltd., as billionaire owner Patrick Drahi sells down parts of his empire.】
